title: Algeria Launches National Polio Vaccination Days to Protect Children - fundsforNGOs News
snippet: The Minister of Health, Professor Mohamed Seddik Aït Messaoudène, alongside key officials from the National Body for the Protection and Promotion of Children, WHO, and UNICEF, officially launched the National Polio Vaccination Days on December 30, 2025. The initiative marks a significant ...

title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform (Algeria) | GHDx
snippet: Formerly named the Ministry of Health and Population (Ministère de la Santé et de la Population).

title: Ministry of Health and Population (Algeria) | GHDx
snippet: Changed its name around 2000 to Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform (Ministère de la Santé, de la Population et de la Réforme Hospitalière)

title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform - Wikipedia
snippet: The current minister is Abdelhak Saihi (since 9 September 2022).
